name: Fort De France Pierre-Aliker Carribean Soccer 23
name_original: Fort De France Pierre-Aliker Carribean Soccer 23
description:
Play Soccer In The Pierre Aliker Stadium

Instructions: 

✪ Start on easy level.  

✪ You are REDS.  

✪ Use ARROW keys to get the ball and dribble ↑ screen.

✪ SPACEBAR for an extra hard kick
